name: Astral Blood
description:
Astral Blood is a top down tactical shooter where you control a ship that may only shoot in 4 directions: up, down, left and right. Explore and find upgrades, hidden bosses and pickups to boost your energy and keep your ship running. Fight through waves of diverse sets of enemies to reach the end of each level.

Currently in development:

-Need to finish last boss

-SFX still missing (Shields, enemy fire, blood splatter, 2nd boss sounds, spawned enemies)

-Need to finish last two songs
